title: 1. Delete Minor Contract.  Club Contract Basic User
custom_steps:
Login as club-boc-all
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select a player from same club as login club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Go back to <Search> pane on the left
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract Search>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select a player from a different club as login club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Logout
custom_expected:
Succesfully login
Takes you to Search Screen
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of players on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there is no trash can displayed at all for any row.
Takes you back to search screen.
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of players on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there is no trash can displayed at all for any row. Ensure that the player that is being tested has at least one  Approved and one preliminary contracts in his history to verify this step
Successfully Logged Out

title: 1.  Delete Minor Contract.  Club Admin User
custom_steps:
Login as Club Admin Login (e.g.Phi)
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> <Is>  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select a player from same club as login club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on Trash Can on a contract. Trash Icon only appears when the contract is in Preliminary Status.
Press Yes to confirm deletion
Press F5 to refresh, and then click on Contracts tab again.
Select any Addendum with Trash Icon.  Trash Icon only appears when the Addendum is in Preliminary Status.  Press the Trash Icon to delete the Addendum
Pess Yes to confirm deletion
Press F5 to refresh, and then click on Contracts tab again.
Go back to <Search> pane on the left
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select a player from a different club as login club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Logout
custom_expected:
Succesfully login
Takes you to Search Screen
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of players on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there will be a trash icon for all the contracts in Preliminary Status.  

There will be a trash icon for all forms/addendums that have the contract status of Preliminary, otherwise, no trash icon will appear for the forms/addendums.
A popup will ask the user if the user is sure they will delete the contract.
The Contract will be deleted.  The total counts will be updated, and will not longer be able see that Contract on the Contract History screen any longer.
Ensure the deleted contract is still not displaying, and the total counts have been updated
Displays a warning message to continue with Delete  or Not
The Addendum will be deleted.  The total counts will be updated, and will not longer be able see that Addendum on the Contract History screen any longer.
Ensure the Addendum contract is still not displaying, and the total counts have been updated
Takes you back to search screen.
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of players on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there is no trash can displayed at all for any row. Ensure that the player that is being tested has at least one  Approved and one preliminary contracts in his history to verify this step
Successfully Logged Out

custom_steps:
Login as BOC Contract Basic
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button

Click on the <Contracts> tab

custom_expected:
Succesfully login

Creates the search filter
Returns a list of palyers on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>

title: 1.  Delete Minor Contract (BOC Admin User)
custom_steps:
Login as BOC Contracts Admin (e.g. Hou)
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select any player from any club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Select any contract with a prelimanry status and press the Trash Icon
Pess Yes to confirm deletion
Press F5 to refresh, and then click on Contracts tab again.
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract>, and in "Add New Filter" select <Contract type> Is  <First Year Domestic>, and press the <Add Filter> button
Press <Search> Button
Select any player from any club
Click on the <Contracts> tab
custom_expected:
Succesfully login
Takes you to Search Screen
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of palyers on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there will be a trash icon for all the contracts.  There will be a trash icon for all forms/addendums that have the contract status of Preliminary, otherwise, no trash icon will appear for the forms/addendums.
Displays a warning message to continue with Delete or Not
The Contract will be deleted.  The total counts will be updated, and will no longer be able see that Contract on the Contract History screen any longer.
Ensure the deleted contract is still not displaying, and the total counts have been updated
Takes you to Search Screen
Creates the search filter
Returns a list of players at the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget.  And there will be a trash icon for all the contracts.  There will be a trash icon for all forms/addendums that have the contract status of Preliminary, otherwise, no trash icon will appear for the forms/addendums.

title: 2. Delete Add C, D or Cuban OFAC
custom_steps:
Log into admin-boc-all
Go to Advanced Search on left tab
Search for a Preliminary Addendum C using Minor Contracts search
Select any Player with Addendum C at preliminary status  
Go to Contracts tab
Trash Icon only appears when the Addendum is in Preliminary Status.  
Press the Trash Icon to delete the Addendum
Pess Yes to confirm deletion
Press F5 to refresh, and then click on Contracts tab again.
Go to Advanced Search on left tab
Search for a Preliminary Addendum D using Minor Contracts search
Select any Player with Addendum D at preliminary status  
Go to Contracts tab
Select any Addendum D with Trash Icon.  
Trash Icon only appears when the Addendum is in Preliminary Status.  
Press the Trash Icon to delete the Addendum
Pess Yes to confirm deletion
Press F5 to refresh, and then click on Contracts tab again.
Logout
custom_expected:
Successfully logged on
Advanced Search is opened
Search for Preliminary Addendum Cs is done
Players profile is opened
Contract history is opened
Displays a warning message to continue with Delete or Not
The Addendum will be deleted.  
The total counts will be updated, and will not longer be able see that Addendum on the Contract History screen any longer.
Ensure the Addendum contract is still not displaying, and the number of entries has been updated
Advanced Search is opened
Search for Preliminary Addendum Ds is done
Players profile is opened
Contract history is opened
Displays a warning message to continue with Delete or or Not
The Addendum will be deleted.  
The total counts will be updated, and will not longer be able see that Addendum on the Contract History screen any longer.
Ensure the Addendum contract is still not displaying, and the number of entries has been updated
Successfully Logged Out

title: Filter Header: Minor
custom_steps:
Locate filter at header of the widget
Click dropdown, select Minor
custom_expected:
Dropdown appears
Minor is selected and widget refreshes to show player's minor contracts by order of year

title: Sort: Year
custom_steps:
Click on year column
Repeat test on every column in the widget. Sort on each column twice
custom_expected:
Shows all contracts starting with most recent by default. Clicking on the "year" header will cause the column to sort in reverse chronological order.
Results reload based on column that was sorted on

title: Gear: Refresh
custom_steps: Click on Gear icon, and click refresh
custom_expected: Widget will refresh

title: Gear: Export
custom_steps:
Click on gear icon, and select Export to PDF
Click on gear icon, and select Export to Excel
custom_expected:
Widget data will export into a PDF Document
Widget data will export into an Excel Worksheet

title: Maximize/Minimize
custom_steps: Click (+) Sign on the widget upper right hand corner
custom_expected: Widget will maximize and take up the whole screen. Clicking the (-) sign should bring widget back to its normal state.

title: Filter: General
custom_steps:
Click Funnel icon on upper right hand corner
Type in a keyword in the freeform textbok(such a org name)
custom_expected:
Window opens with textbook and columns to filter by dropdown
Widget will refresh to show any relevant results including the keyword you entered

title: Filter:
custom_steps:
Click on filter icon on upper right hand corner
Filter at least once by each type:
Year: textbox
Contract Level: dropdown multiselect
Signing Org/Club: dropdown
Signing Date: Date Range
Choose a filter, then click trashcan icon next to it
Add two or more filters at once, click apply
custom_expected:
Window opens with textbox and columns to filter by dropdown
Clicking Apply should refresh widget data with selected filter. Clicking Reset should wipe out any selected filter and bring widget back to original state
Dropdown multiselect options: Major, Minor, Add. C, and Add. D
Dropdown of 30 MLB clubs
Should be able to search with operators before, after and between
Filter should be deleted
Widget should refresh with data relevant to all filters selected

title: Column Visibility Settings
custom_steps: Future
custom_expected: Future

title: Gear: Tear Out
custom_steps:
Click on gear icon, and select Tear Out
Retest all functionality on Global Features on Tear Out
custom_expected:
Contract History widget will be created in a new tab/window
All global features settings work in Tear out tab

title: Contract History
custom_steps:
Log into admin-boc-all
Click on "Search" in the toolbar to the left
Populate the search field with Professional Player Search with filter Last Name contains A
Select Aalbers, Brady
Click on Contracts Tab
Check colors of contracts listed in contract history widget
Check seperation of contracts based off contrast of color
Hover over "I" in Signing Org/Club
Hover over "I" in Salary
Click on "Type" dropdown next to Contract History
Click on Major,Minor and All
Scroll right towards Addendum F and G
Click on a existing contract in contract history that is not preliminary
Click on back button
Click on "Create New"
Fill out all required fields
Click "Save" Button
Click on back button
Click on newly created preliminary contract
Click on Username
Click on Logout
custom_expected:
Successfully logged in
Advanced Search should appear with choice to choose type of search and filters
Search Results table should appear with Players Last Name's who contain the letter a
Player's Profile appear's with Information tab and Contract Tab
Contract History of players previous and current contracts are listed. 

This includes contracts and addendum c's.
Preliminary contracts are listed in Red, Pending transactions are listed in green and all other transactions are listed in black.
The contracts are seperated with a different shade of blue every time a new contract is listed.
The contract's information of the signing org and club appears. (Club, Level, and League). Alignment should match wireframe
The contract's salary information appears.( From different levels of play. AAA -> R League's ). Alignment should match wireframe
Major,Minor, and All should be selectable from the dropdown
When Major, Minor or All are selected, contract history filters the result to only include contracts of that choice
If a contract has Addendum F or G, a green check mark  exists
Contract details appear in view mode
Contract History will appear
Minor Contract choice appears
All red asterisk forms should be completed
Contract should be saved as a preliminary contract
Contract History will appear
Contract details should appear in edit mode
Settings and Logout should appear as dropdown
Blue box appears on bottom right. "Successfully logged out"

title: Frontend Rules
custom_steps:
Log into Ebis2 as:admin-boc-all
Select Advanced Search
Make the following selections:  Search For <Professional Player Search>,  <New Search>.  In add New filter - select <Last Name> <Contains> <a>, click Add filter, then press "Search" button. (Use Paul Bently)
Choose and click on Aalbers Brady in the search results.
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on <Create New> button
Click on Minor Contract
Fill in the red asterisk forms in Addendum A,B,C, and any optional Addendum that is toggled Yes.
Fill in Terms Agreed Upon Date and Date Signed by Player after July 1st.
Select for Season(s) dropdown
Select a number of seasons that player will be under the current contract.
Select ORG dropdown
Select the organization that the player is signing for
Expand Addendum B
Click on Minor League Assignments Salary
Click on Add Row. Repeat until you can no longer add rows
Click on Trash Can on Payment Year
Logout
custom_expected:
Successfully Login
Opens The Search Screen
This will search for players with names containing "a" , and return results below in the "Search Results" area.  Players' contracts with several types of contract statuses will display.
A window with the player's info displays on the <info> tab.  There is also a <Contracts> info tab.
Contract History appears
Minor Contract appears from drop down
Contract Details page appears 
Addendum A expanded 
Addendum B and C are collapsed and cannot be removed
Addendum E,F and G appear by default. The trash icon allows them to be removed.
Ability to save and create contract.
Beginning in Year selection shows only valid options of this year or next year contract start date.
Dropdown will appear with numbers 1 through 7
The Seasons form will have 1 to a maximum of 7 filled in.
MEX or Player's organization appears in dropdown
Selected organization fills in the dropdown form.
Sections in Addendum B should appear with Minor League Terms, Termination Pay, and Major League Terms.They should be switched to No as default.
Forms appear for salary amount that is paid hourly or annually per league for a specific year.
The number of rows added must be equal to or less than the length of the contract seasons.
Only last row is deletable and is removed, trash can appears in previous year.
Successfully Logged Out

title: Contract Creation
custom_steps:
Log into Ebis2 as:Club-boc-ama-1
Select Advanced Search
Make the following selections:  Search For <Professional Player Search>, <Choose New Search>.  In add New filter - select <Last Name> <Contains> <a> click Add filter, then press "Search" button.
Choose and click on Aalbers Brady.
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on Create New button
Click on Minor Contract
Click Add Section
Click Add Section and select all Addendums from the drop down
Expand Addendum A
Fill out Addendum A - required fields - Org, Club, Terms Agreed Upon Date, Date Signed,Authoritzed Signature By Player
click on the <Save> button on the bottom right hand side
Expand Addendum B
Expand a Section and fill out the details
Select Language Drop Down
Click on Trash Can in Section
Click <Add Term> button
Select section that is missing in the contract.
Click on Trash Can in header
Expand Addendum C
Enter a value into the Single Salary Value box
Click on <Select a Salary Structure>
Select a Salary Structure
Click on the Trash Can on Addendum E
Toggle any Addendum to No (If toggled Yes)
Click on <Add Section>
Click on Addendum E
Expand Attached Files Section
Drag a file into the Drop Files Here box
Select Label drop down
Click <Save> button
Click <Update Status> button
custom_expected:
Successfully Login
Opens The Search Screen
This will search for First year domestic players contracts, and return results below in the "Search Results" area.  Players' contracts with several types of contract statuses will display.
A window with the player's info displays on the <info> tab.  There is also a <Contracts> info tab.
Contract History appears
Minor Contract appears from drop down
Contract Details page appears 
Addendum A expanded 
Addendum B and C are collapsed and cannot be removed
Addendum E,F and G appear by default. The trash icon allows them to be removed.
If player has a home country of Mexico, the Mexican Assignment Agreement comes up as default,otherwise it is hidden in Add Section
Addendum dropdown should appear ( Addendum H should be in Add Section by default)
After adding all available Addendums Add Selection button should go to unselected stage (button is disabled)
Addendum A should automatically be expanded (Expand Manually if needed)
Addendum A should be filled out with information of the player.
Successfully saves and displays "The Minor Contract has been sucessfuly saved" in blue on the bottom right hand side.
Sections in Addendum B should appear and be switched to No as default.
On entering information the section will be toggled to "Yes" automatically, if not toggle it to "Yes".
Drop down with Language choices appears.
Section is deleted and no longer a part of the contract.
Add Term dropdown should appear with all available sections not listed in the Contract.
System adds the section to the appropriate position in the listing, auto-expands it and auto-toggles it to Yes. Screens jump to the term.
Hides all sections that belong to that header.
Expanding Addendum C shows the salary information on the contract.
It automatically populates all of the rows in the Salary Amount column of the Minor League Clubs table with that value.
A dropdown menu appears with the type of salary contract structure the player may receive.
The chosen structure populates the Salary Structure box and changes the salary amounts based on the structure.
All information in Addendum E is deleted and is hidden from the contract.
Leaves the information inputted into the Addendum for anyone to look at, but is not included in the contract.
Addendum dropdown should appear
Addendum E will be added back to the contract and is visible.
Attached Files should show a Drop Files Here box.
A file is uploaded onto the contract with a name,label,modify date, size, and comments.
A dropdown menu appears with different types of Labels.
The contract is saved and shows a successful blue notification on the bottom right corner.
The status of the contract is updated and shows a blue notification on the bottom right corner that it has successfully been submitted.

Check on top of contract

Players with last name containing a appear in search results
Pro Players information is shown
Shows the Contract History Screen and shows the con

title: Cannot create preliminary contract if another already exists from ANY org
custom_preconds: * Does not apply to international amateur contracts
custom_steps:
Log into admin-nyy-all
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
Do a <Professional Player Search> for <Last Name> <Contains> <A>
Find a player whose current org is yankees
Click on Contracts Tab
Click on <Create New>
Click on Minor Contract
Fill out all required details
Click <Save>
Click on Back button
Click on <Create New>
Logout
Log in admin-ari-all
Go to the Advanced Search by clicking on <Search> on left side of the pane
Do a <Professional Player Search> for <Last Name> <Contains> <A>
Find the same player from before
Click on Contracts Tab
custom_expected:
Successfully logged in
Takes you to Search Screen
Players with last name containing a appear in search results
Player's info is shown
Shows the Contract History Screen
Contract creation dropdown list appears
Minor contract appears in edit mode
All forms with red asterisks are filled
Contract is saved as a preliminary contract
Brings user back to Contract History
Error message appears that states you cannot create another preliminary contract
Takes you to Search Screen
Players with last name containing a appear in search results
Player's information is shown
Shows the Contract History Screen and shows the contract. The Create new button should not be visible

title: Non First year
custom_steps:
Login as admin-nyy-all
Go to Advanced Search, and bring up a player profile for a non-first year
On the search results click the player, and a player who doesn't have one of the fields not filled out:  First Name, 
Last Name, SSN (US, Puerto Rico) or Cedula Number for Venezuela, BirthDate, Street Address, City, State, Zip Code/Postal Code, Telephone No, Pos, Height, Weight, Batting, Hand Throwing, Place of Birth - City, State, Country
Click on the <Contract> Tab
Click on the <Create New> button
Click on the <Minor Contract>
Click on <Back> on the Message
Click on the <Create New> button
Click on the <Minor Contract>
Click on the <Continue>on the Message
Enter all the required fields on Addendum A. 
Press the <Back> button on the browser
Click on the <Contract> Tab, if already on <Contract> tab then go to the next step
Click on the <Create New> button
Click on the <Minor Contract>
Click on the <Complete Profile> on the Message
Close the Player Profile window, and go back to the contract history tab
custom_expected:
Login Successful shows deafult tab (home page)
Shows search results
Opens the players profile screen, and the <Contract> tab is showing.
Opens the Contract History Page and shows the contrac history for the player
Popup displays varoius types of items that could be created
Message "This contract may not be submitted until the following fields are completed on the Player's profile [List bulleted missing fields]" is displayed with buttons <Complete Profile>, <Continue>, <Back>.
Take user to player profile bio page in new parent window in edit mode and highlight required fields in red
Continue with Contract - Take user to contract creation page as normal
Back - Return user to page
Returns you to the Contract History Page
Popup displays varoius types of items that could be created
Message "This contract may not be submitted until the following fields are completed on the Player's profile [List bulleted missing fields]" is displayed with buttons <Complete Profile>, <Continue>, <Back>.
Take user to player profile bio page in new parent window in edit mode and highlight required fields in red
Continue with Contract - Take user to contract creation page as normal
Back - Return user to page
Brings you to the contract details page
Will successfuly save the Contract
Will navigate back to the Contract History Page, and will also show the newly saved contract for the player.
Opens the Contract History Page and shows the contrac history for the player
Popup displays varoius types of items that could be created
Message "This contract may not be submitted until the following fields are completed on the Player's profile [List bulleted missing fields]" is displayed with buttons <Complete Profile>, <Continue>, <Back>.
Take user to player profile bio page in new parent window in edit mode and highlight required fields in red
Continue with Contract - Take user to contract creation page as normal
Back - Return user to page
Takes you to the player profile bio page in 
new parent window in edit mode and 
highlights required fields in red
Closes Player Profile window sucessfully, and now looking at the Contract History Tab

title: First year International (Negation).  Cannot create a new contract for a player until his eligible to sign date. See international:https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1433659
custom_steps:
In "Search For" select <Minor Contract Search>, and in Add new type of filter select <Contract type> Is  <1st Year International>, and press the <Add Filter> button  (Bring up an International Porfile Search - use intl login or domestic login?), and press <Search>
Select a player whose eligible to sign date is after than the current date
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on <Create New> button
Select "Minor Contract"
Click on the <Back> button

Returns a list of palyers on the bottom in the Search Results area
Opens up Player Info tab, with another tab titled <Contracts>
Displays the Contract History widget
Pop-up displays with varoius possible values including "Minor Contract"
Displays a message "A new Minor League Contract may only be created for this player on or after his eligible to sign date" with <Back> button.
Takes you back to the contract screen

title: First Year International
custom_steps:
Ensure you are logged in as Club, if not log out, clear cache, and login as Club, and
go to the Advanced Search Screen
Search for a player that belongs to the club-login (and also a  player that you know has an existing investigation that is visibile to the login-club)
Click on the that users
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on <Create New> button
Click on "New Contract"
Press the <View existing inv>  button
Press the <Back>  button
Click on <Create New> button, and then on Click <New Contract>
Click the <Continue anyway> button
Fill in all required fileds in Addendum A. And some data in Addendum B, and C, and press the <Save> button
custom_expected:
Showing the advanced search screen
Brings up search results on the bottom of the search screen
Brings up player profile
Brings up the Contracts (History) Screen
Pop-up is displayed
A message is displayed "This player has an investigation on file"
with buttons<Continue anyway>, <View existing inv>, <Back>
Opens the investigation in a new parent window
Returns to page
A message is displayed "This player has an investigation on file"
with buttons<Continue anyway>, <View existing inv>, <Back>
Opens up the contracts page
Successfuly Saves the contract and displays the success message on the B-RHS of the screen.

title: Player profile or registration profile must have all fields required completed for Contract creation.
custom_steps:
Go to Advanced Search, and bring up a player profile for a first year Intl contract
On the search results click the player
On the player profile screen if all the fields below are not filled out, go into edit mode and fill them out, and save them:
First Name
Last Name
SSN (US or Puerto Rico) /Cedula number (venezuela)
Birthdate
Street Address, city, state, zip code (or equivalent)
Telephone number
Position
Height
Weight
Batting hand
Throwing hand
High school or JC or College name
High School or JC or College graduation date

title: Contract Creation
custom_steps:
Log into Ebis2 as:admin-boc-all
Select Advanced Search
Make the following selections:  Search For <Minor Contracts>, <New Search>.  In add New filter - select <Roster Last Name> <Contains> <Any Letter>, then press "Search" button.
Choose and click on any contract in the search results.
Click on the <Contracts> tab
Click on <Create New> button
Click on Minor Contract
Fill in the red asterisk forms in Addendum A,B,C, and any optional Addendum that is toggled Yes.
Select the organization that the player is signing for
Fill in Terms Agreed Upon Date and Date Signed by Player after July 1st.
Check Date of Birth for a date that is less than 17 years ago
Contract autopopulates Beginning in Year is the upcoming year, then the Player Signed by Date must be after July 1st
Find Seasons on player's minor contract
Select ORG dropdown
Logout
custom_expected:
Successfully Login
Opens The Search Screen
This will search for contracts with last name containing the letter you selected, and return results below in the "Search Results" area.  Players' contracts with several types of contract statuses will display.
A window with the player's info displays on the <info> tab.  There is also a <Contracts> info tab.
Contract History appears
Minor Contract appears from drop down
Contract Details page appears 
Addendum A expanded 
Addendum B and C are collapsed and cannot be removed
Addendum E,F and G appear by default. The trash icon allows them to be removed.
Ability to save and create contract.
Selected organization fills in the dropdown form.
Beginning in Year selection shows only valid options of this next year contract start date.
Gives a hard error indicating the contract is invalid.
Beginning in Year selection only allows years after the current year if after July 1st
Season's should bet set to 7 and should be unable to be changed.
MEX(if player is from mexico) or Player's organization appears in dropdown as default
Successfully Logged Out

Select any international amateur player
Click on the <Contracts> tab

Choose "Minor Contract" on the  pop-up

Delete Addendum F, G, and Mexican Assignment Agreement by pressing their respective Trash icons.

Addendum B, C, will appear collapsed, and no trash/delete icon on them.

Mexican Assignment Agreement is toggled "Yes" if player is from Mexico

The <Add Section> button is enabled.

Click the Utilities and Settings option (Gear Icon) (Steps 1.07-1.1 can be found here)
Click on  "Settings"
Insert all column choices into column visibility
Click Apply and close in settings
Click on "Tear Out"
Click on "Refresh" in Utilities and Settings option (Gear Icon)
Click on "Export to Excel"
Click on "Export to PDF"

title: Club - Contracts - Basic
custom_steps:
International > Cuban OFAC
Bonuses > Rule 4 Signing Bonus
Bonuses > Bonus Tracker
Contract Creation > Contract History
Contract Creation
Addendum Cs
Addendum Ds
Bonuses > International Signing Bonus
Advanced Search
Advanced Search
custom_expected:
Can view/click into a Cuban OFAC form initiated by that club only. Can also view but NOT click into a Cuban OFAC history entry in Player Profile - Contract History that is in Approved State submitted by any club
Can view Rule 4 Signing Bonuses widget of that club
Can view Bonus Tracking widget for that club and can view the Mnr Bonuses tab on Player profile
Can view all Addendum and contract history for that club. Can view Addendum and Contract history entries of any clubs where it is in a state of Terms Accepted or higher
Can only view minor contracts (based on view rules)
Can view Addendum Cs for players on thier org on the Addendum C widget and on a contract
Can view Addendum Ds for players on thier org on a contract
Can view the "International Signing Bonus" widget for that Org and the "Intl Signing Bns Slots" widget
Has access to Minor Contracts Search
Has access to Minor Contracts Langauge Search

title: Club - Contract Negotiator
custom_steps: Contract Creation and Contract History
custom_expected: Has permission to create a new contract and update the status to "Submit to Club Personel". This user does NOT have permission to view any contracts including the one he created. This user can view contract History but cannot click into the contracts. This user cannot create Addendum Cs or Ds.

title: Club - Contracts - Admin
custom_steps:
International > Cuban OFAC
International > Cuban OFAC
Bonuses > Rule 4 Signing Bonus
Bonuses > Bonus Tracker
Contract Creation > Contract History
Contract Creation > Contract History
Contract Creation
Contract Approval
Contract Approval
Contract Approval
Standard Language
Addendum C
Addendum D
Contract settings
Contract settings
Bonuses > International Signing Bonus
Advanced Search
Advanced Search
custom_expected:
Can view/click into a Cuban OFAC form initiated by that club only. Can also view but NOT click into a Cuban OFAC history entry in Player Profile - Contract History that is in Approved State submitted by any club
Can create/submit/edit/delete a Cuban OFAC form for that club. Cannot edit/delete once submitted.
Can use edit mode of the Rule 4 Signing Bonuses widget for that club. (Note: Club cannot update Signed Date and Actual Signing Bonus columns)
Can view/update Bonus Tracking widget for that club and can view the Mnr Bonuses tab on Player profile
Can view all Addendum and contract history for that club. Can view Addendum and Contract history entries of any clubs where it is in a state of Terms Accepted or higher
Can delete Preliminary Contracts/addendums for that club but not system-created draft contracts
Can create and view minor contracts
Can submit Contract to Club.
Can submit contract to BOC
Can withdraw a contract
Can use Contract Language widget and create/edit and submit Club Standard language
Can create and submit Addendum Cs for players on their ORG via Addendum C widget or as a single C form. Can also use the bulk upload feature, Salary Structures widget and Print Visa addendum Cs.
Can create and submit Addendum Ds for players on their ORG
Can see and edit the Authorized Signatory / Negotiator widget for thier ORG
Can see and edit Contract Defaults widget for thier ORG
Can view and edit the "International Signing Bonus" widget for that Org and view the "Intl Signing Bns Slots" widget
Has access to Minor Contracts Search
Has access to Minor Contracts Langauge Search

Can view Bonus Tracking widget for all clubs (with toggle) and can view the Mnr Bonuses tab on Player profile
Can view all Addendum and contract history for all clubs
Can view minor contracts from all clubs
Can view all Addendum C's from any org on the Addendum C widget and on a contract
Can print Visa Addendum Cs
Can view all Addendum D's from any org
Can view the "International Signing Bonus" widget for all Orgs and view the "Intl Signing Bns Slots" widget

Can view/click into a Cuban OFAC form by any club
Can edit/delete a Cuban OFAC for any club prior to approval
Can Approve/reject Cuban OFAC form
Can create/view/update Posting reports
Can view/edit all fields in Rule 4 Signing Bonuses widgets for all clubs (with toggle)
Can view/edit Rule 4 Signing Bonuses - All Clubs widget
Can view Rule 4 Signing Bonuses - Labor view widget
Can view/update Bonus Tracking widget for all clubs and can view the Mnr Bonuses tab on Player profile
Can view all Addendum and contract history for all clubs
Can delete Preliminary Contracts/addendums for all clubs
Can create and view minor contracts for all clubs
Can receive clipboard notifications for contracts pending approval. Can perform all stateflow changes for contract. Can see Pending Contracts widget and send reminders from it
Can see and use the Minor Contracts Verification widget
Can create/edit and approve Standard Language
Can create and submit Addendum Cs for any org on the Addendum C widget and via a Single C form
Can approve Addendum Cs from any org on the Addendum C widget and via a Single C form. Can also make all other Stateflow changes. Can also use the Pending C's widget and Salary structures widget for any org.
Can see and edit the Authorized Signatory / Negotiator widget for all ORGs
Can run and view progress of Delete Preliminary Contracts Batch
Can run and view progress of Expire Minor Contracts Batch
Can run and view progress of Minor Free Agency Batch
Can create and submit Addendum Ds for any org
Can approve Addendum Ds from any org
Can view and edit the "International Signing Bonus" widget for all Orgs and view the "Intl Signing Bns Slots" widget.
Can view International Signing Bonus - Summary widget
Has access to Minor Contracts Search
Has access to Minor Contracts Langauge Search
